snippet: Marcel Hirscher, seeking his fifth straight overall World Cup title, was beaten by Henrik Kristoffersen, who easily protected his first-run lead in Val d’Isère, France.
abstract: Winter Sports Roundup; Henrik Kristoffersen wins World Cup slalom in Val d'Isere, France; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher, seeking his fifth straight overall World Cup title, was beaten by Henrik Kristoffersen, who easily protected his first-run lead in Val d’Isère, France.

headline.main: Norwegian, 21, Tops Hirscher in World Cup Slalom Opener
headline.print_headline: Norwegian, 21, Tops Hirscher in World Cup Slalom Opener
